name: Jicama-And-Sun-Dried-Tomato Salad With Champagne Vinaigrette
keywords: champagne vinegar, chives, cilantro, jicama, lime, radicchio, sun-dried tomato, high fiber, low calorie, low-fat, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 2/3 cups julienned jicama, placed in a bowl of cold water and refrigerated

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine tomatoes, cilantro, pepper, chives, lime and lemon juice, olive oil and vinegar. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. Drain jicama and toss with tomato mixture. Place 1/4 cup of the radicchio on each of 4 plates. Arrange a heaping 1/2 cup of the salad over the radicchio. Garnish with lime zest and serve.
